title: Lead (Pb) management in the entire life cycle of highly efficient and stable perovskite solar cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01829J, Paper
Kai Liu, Tianxiang Hu, Zenghua Cai, Fengcai Liu, Saqib Rafique, Xiaoguo Li, Liangliang Deng, Chongyuan Li, Yanyan Wang, Qiang Guo, Xiaofei Yue, Jiao Wang, Yingguo Yang, Chunxiao Cong, Shiyou Chen, Jia Zhang, Anran Yu, Yiqiang Zhan
Through Pb-related-issues-management covering the entire life cycles of perovskite solar cells (PSCs) via BP additives, the highly efficient, ultra-stable and environmentally-friendly PSCs have been successfully developed.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
